sqlMap.select:
select t.rowNumber as "rowNum" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(t.requestDate , 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD')as "requestDate" , t.mdDupYN as "mdDupYN" , t.venueCD as "venueCD" , t.venueNm as "venueNm" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','TERRITORYCD',t.territoryCD,null) as "territoryCDName" , t.phoneNo as "phoneNo" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','FASCIACD',t.fascia,null) as "fasciaCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','VENUEGRADCD',t.venueGradCD,null) as "venueGradCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD1', t.addrTpCD1, null) as "addrTpCD1Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD2', t.addrTpCD2, null) as "addrTpCD2Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD3', t.addrTpCD3, null) as "addrTpCD3Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD4', t.addrTpCD4, null) as "addrTpCD4Name" , t.postCD as "postCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SITECD',t.siteCD,null) as "siteCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','CHANNELCD',t.channelCD,null) as "channelCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SUBCHANNELCD',t.subChannelCD,null) as "subChannelCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SEGMENTCD',t.segmentCD,null) as "segmentCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SUBSEGMENTCD',t.subSegmentCD,null) as "subSegmentCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','RESERVESEGMENTCD',t.reserveSegmentCD,null) as "reserveSegmentCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','AGEINGCD',t.ageingCD, null) as "ageingCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ACTIVEYN',t.kegYN, null) as "kegYN" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ACTIVEYN',t.activeYN, null) as "activeYN" , t.mdVenueCD as "mdVenueCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','LOCATIONCD',t.locationCD,null) as "locationCDName" , t.ws1SapCD as "ws1SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws1SapCD,null) as "ws1SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws1CD,null) as "branch1" , t.ws2SapCD as "ws2SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws2SapCD,null) as "ws2SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws2CD,null) as "branch2" , t.ws3SapCD as "ws3SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws3SapCD,null) as "ws3SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws3CD,null) as "branch3" , t.ws4SapCD as "ws4SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws4SapCD,null) as "ws4SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws4CD,null) as "branch4" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','APPRSTATECD',t.requestStateCD,null) as "requestStateCDName" , t.oldAddr1 as "oldAddr1" , t.newAddr1 as "newAddr1" , t.oldAddr2 as "oldAddr2" , t.newAddr2 as "newAddr2" , t.requestCommt as "requestCommt" from ( select rank() over(order by a.requestDate desc) as rowNumber , floor((rank() over(order by a.requestDate desc)-1)/#displayNum#+1) as pageNum , a.requestDate , a.mdDupYN , a.venueGradCD , a.venueCD , a.venueNm , a.territoryCD , a.phoneNo , a.fascia , a.addrTpCD1 , a.addrTpCD2 , a.addrTpCD3 , a.addrTpCD4 , a.siteCD , a.segmentCD , a.subSegmentCD , a.channelCD , a.subChannelCD , a.reserveSegmentCD , a.ageingCD , a.kegYN , a.activeYN , a.locationCD , a.ws1CD , a.ws1SapCD , a.ws2CD , a.ws2SapCD , a.ws3CD , a.ws3SapCD , a.ws4CD , a.ws4SapCD , a.venueDivCD , a.incntTpCD , a.mdVenueCD , a.newAddr1 , a.oldAddr1 , a.postCD , a.requestStateCD , a.newAddr2 , a.oldAddr2 , a.commt as requestCommt from GVEN06MT a inner join GVEN02MT b on a.venueCD = b.venueCD where 1=1 and a.regID = #empID# and a.requestDate between #requestDateFrom# and #requestDateTo#
a.requestStateCD = #apprStateCD#
a.venueGradCD = #venueGradCD#
upper(a.venueCD) = upper(#venueCD#)
upper(a.venueNm) like '%'||upper(#venueNm#)||'%'
b.territoryCD = #territoryCD#
) t where 1=1
and pageNum = #pageNum#

select t.venueCD as "venueCD" , t.venueNm as "venueNm" , t.ageingCD as "agingCD" , t.dkmdTpCD as "dkmdTpCD" , t.territoryCD as "territoryCD " , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','TERRITORYCD', t.territoryCD,null) as "territoryCDName" , t.reserveSegmentCD as "reserveSegmentCD" , t.venueGradCD as "venueGradCD" , t.activeYN as "activeYN" , t.kegYN as "kegYN" , t.newaddr1 || ' ' || t.newaddr2 as "newAddr" , t.addrTpCD1 as "addrTpCD1" , t.addrTpCD2 as "addrTpCD2" , t.addrTpCD3 as "addrTpCD3"
, getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD1', t.addrTpCD1, null) as "addrTpCD1Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD2', t.addrTpCD2, null) as "addrTpCD2Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD3', t.addrTpCD3, null) as "addrTpCD3Name"
, t.locationCD as "locationCD" , t.fascia as "fasciaCD" , t.channelCD as "channelCD" , t.subChannelCD as "subChannelCD" , t.siteCD as "siteCD" , t.segmentCD as "segmentCD" , t.subSegmentCD as "subSegmentCD" , t.phoneNo as "phoneNo" , t.incntTpCD as "incntTpCD"
, t.legalCD as "legalCD" , t.mdDupYN as "mdDupYN" , t.ws1CD as "ws1CD" , t.ws1SapCD as "ws1SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD', t.ws1SapCD,null) as ws1SapCDName , t.ws2CD as "ws2CD" , t.ws2SapCD as "ws2SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD', t.ws2SapCD,null) as ws2SapCDName , t.ws3CD as "ws3CD" , t.ws3SapCD as "ws3SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD', t.ws3SapCD,null) as ws3SapCDName , t.ws4CD as "ws4CD" , t.ws4SapCD as "ws4SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws4SapCD,null) as ws4SapCDName , t.note1 as "note1" , t.note2 as "note2" , t.note3 as "note3" , t.note4 as "note4" , t.requestStateCD as "requestStateCD" , t.printYN as "printYN" , t.postCD as "postCD" , t.oldAddr1 as "oldAddr1" , t.newAddr1 as "newAddr1" , t.oldAddr2 as "oldAddr2" , t.newAddr2 as "newAddr2" , t.mdVenueCD as "mdVenueCD" , t.sellingAreaID as "sellingAreaID" , t.refNo as "refNo" , t.customerID as "customerID" , t.customerNm as "customerNm" , t.country as "country" , t.rageSphereCD as "rageSphereCD" , t.teamCD as "teamCD" , t.repNm as "repNm" , t.repNm_kr as "repNm_KR" , t.sellingAreaNm as "sellingAreaNm" , t.legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo as "legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo" , t.legacyBackOfficeAccountNo as "legacyBackOfficeAccountNo" , t.license as "license" , t.createDate as "createDate" , t.sellingAreaCreatedDate as "sellingAreaCreatedDate" , t.lastModifiedDate as "lastModifiedDate" , t.sellingAreaLastModifiedDate as "sellingAreaLastModifiedDate" , t.lastModifiedBy as "lastModifiedBy" , t.commt as "commt" from ( select venueCD , venueNm , ageingcd , dkmdTpCD , territoryCD , reservesegmentcd , venuegradcd , activeYN , kegyn , addrTpCD1 , addrTpCD2 , addrTpCD3 , addrTpCD4 , newaddr1 , locationcd , oldaddr1 , fascia , channelCD , subChannelCD , siteCD , segmentCD , subSegmentCD , phoneNo , incntTpCD , venueDivCD , mdDupYN , ws1CD , ws1SapCD , ws2CD , ws2SapCD , ws3CD , ws3SapCD , ws4CD , ws4SapCD , note1 , note2 , note3 , note4 , requestStateCD , printYN , postCD , newAddr2 , oldAddr2 , legalCD , mdVenueCD , sellingAreaID , refNo , customerID , customerNm , country , rageSphereCD , teamCD , repNm , repNm_KR , sellingAreaNm , legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo , legacyBackOfficeAccountNo , license , createDate , sellingAreaCreatedDate , lastModifiedDate , sellingAreaLastModifiedDate , lastModifiedBy , commt from gven06mt where venueCD = #venueCD# and requestDate = #requestDate# ) t

select t.venueCD as "venueCD" , t.venueNm as "venueNm" , t.ageingCD as "agingCD" , t.dkmdTpCD as "dkmdTpCD" , t.territoryCD as "territoryCD " , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','TERRITORYCD', t.territoryCD,null) as "territoryCDName" , t.reserveSegmentCD as "reserveSegmentCD" , t.venueGradCD as "venueGradCD" , t.activeYN as "activeYN" , t.kegYN as "kegYN" , t.newaddr1 || ' ' || t.newaddr2 as "newAddr" , t.addrTpCD1 as "addrTpCD1" , t.addrTpCD2 as "addrTpCD2" , t.addrTpCD3 as "addrTpCD3"
, getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD1', t.addrTpCD1, null) as "addrTpCD1Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD2', t.addrTpCD2, null) as "addrTpCD2Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD3', t.addrTpCD3, null) as "addrTpCD3Name"
, t.locationCD as "locationCD" , t.fascia as "fasciaCD" , t.channelCD as "channelCD" , t.subChannelCD as "subChannelCD" , t.siteCD as "siteCD" , t.segmentCD as "segmentCD" , t.subSegmentCD as "subSegmentCD" , t.phoneNo as "phoneNo" , t.incntTpCD as "incntTpCD"
, t.legalCD as "legalCD" , t.mdDupYN as "mdDupYN" , t.ws1CD as "ws1CD" , t.ws1SapCD as "ws1SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD', t.ws1SapCD,null) as ws1SapCDName , t.ws2CD as "ws2CD" , t.ws2SapCD as "ws2SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD', t.ws2SapCD,null) as ws2SapCDName , t.ws3CD as "ws3CD" , t.ws3SapCD as "ws3SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD', t.ws3SapCD,null) as ws3SapCDName , t.ws4CD as "ws4CD" , t.ws4SapCD as "ws4SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws4SapCD,null) as ws4SapCDName , t.note1 as "note1" , t.note2 as "note2" , t.note3 as "note3" , t.note4 as "note4" , '' as "requestStateCD" , t.printYN as "printYN" , t.postCD as "postCD" , t.oldAddr1 as "oldAddr1" , t.newAddr1 as "newAddr1" , t.oldAddr2 as "oldAddr2" , t.newAddr2 as "newAddr2" , t.mdVenueCD as "mdVenueCD" , t.sellingAreaID as "sellingAreaID" , t.refNo as "refNo" , t.customerID as "customerID" , t.customerNm as "customerNm" , t.country as "country" , t.rageSphereCD as "rageSphereCD" , t.teamCD as "teamCD" , t.repNm as "repNm" , t.repNm_kr as "repNm_KR" , t.sellingAreaNm as "sellingAreaNm" , t.legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo as "legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo" , t.legacyBackOfficeAccountNo as "legacyBackOfficeAccountNo" , t.license as "license" , t.createDate as "createDate" , t.sellingAreaCreatedDate as "sellingAreaCreatedDate" , t.lastModifiedDate as "lastModifiedDate" , t.sellingAreaLastModifiedDate as "sellingAreaLastModifiedDate" , t.lastModifiedBy as "lastModifiedBy" , t.commt as "commt" from ( select venueCD , venueNm , ageingcd , dkmdTpCD , territoryCD , reservesegmentcd , venuegradcd , activeYN , kegyn , addrTpCD1 , addrTpCD2 , addrTpCD3 , addrTpCD4 , newaddr1 , locationcd , oldaddr1 , fascia , channelCD , subChannelCD , siteCD , segmentCD , subSegmentCD , phoneNo , incntTpCD , venueDivCD , mdDupYN , ws1CD , ws1SapCD , ws2CD , ws2SapCD , ws3CD , ws3SapCD , ws4CD , ws4SapCD , note1 , note2 , note3 , note4 , printYN , postCD , newAddr2 , oldAddr2 , legalCD , mdVenueCD , sellingAreaID , refNo , customerID , customerNm , country , rageSphereCD , teamCD , repNm , repNm_KR , sellingAreaNm , legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo , legacyBackOfficeAccountNo , license , createDate , sellingAreaCreatedDate , lastModifiedDate , sellingAreaLastModifiedDate , lastModifiedBy , commt from gven02mt where venueCD = #venueCD# ) t

select count(*) as "totalCount" from GVEN06MT a inner join GVEN02MT b on a.venueCD = b.venueCD where 1=1 and a.regID = #empID# and a.requestDate between #requestDateFrom# and #requestDateTo#
a.requestStateCD = #apprStateCD#
a.venueGradCD = #venueGradCD#
upper(a.venueCD) = upper(#venueCD#)
upper(a.venueNm) like '%'||upper(#venueNm#)||'%'
b.territoryCD = #territoryCD#

select TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(t.requestDate , 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD')as "requestDate" , t.mdDupYN as "mdDupYN" , t.venueCD as "venueCD" , t.venueNm as "venueNm" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','TERRITORYCD',t.territoryCD,null) as "territoryCDName" , t.phoneNo as "phoneNo" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','FASCIACD',t.fascia,null) as "fasciaCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','VENUEGRADCD',t.venueGradCD,null) as "venueGradCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD1', t.addrTpCD1, null) as "addrTpCD1Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD2', t.addrTpCD2, null) as "addrTpCD2Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD3', t.addrTpCD3, null) as "addrTpCD3Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD4', t.addrTpCD4, null) as "addrTpCD4Name" , t.postCD as "postCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SITECD',t.siteCD,null) as "siteCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','CHANNELCD',t.channelCD,null) as "channelCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SUBCHANNELCD',t.subChannelCD,null) as "subChannelCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SEGMENTCD',t.segmentCD,null) as "segmentCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SUBSEGMENTCD',t.subSegmentCD,null) as "subSegmentCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','RESERVESEGMENTCD',t.reserveSegmentCD,null) as "reserveSegmentCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','AGEINGCD',t.ageingCD, null) as "ageingCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ACTIVEYN',t.kegYN, null) as "kegYN" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ACTIVEYN',t.activeYN, null) as "activeYN" , t.mdVenueCD as "mdVenueCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','LOCATIONCD',t.locationCD,null) as "locationCDName" , t.ws1SapCD as "ws1SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws1SapCD,null) as "ws1SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws1CD,null) as "branch1" , t.ws2SapCD as "ws2SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws2SapCD,null) as "ws2SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws2CD,null) as "branch2" , t.ws3SapCD as "ws3SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws3SapCD,null) as "ws3SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws3CD,null) as "branch3" , t.ws4SapCD as "ws4SapCD" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSSAPCD',t.ws4SapCD,null) as "ws4SapCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','WSCD',t.ws4CD,null) as "branch4" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','APPRSTATECD',t.requestStateCD,null) as "requestStateCDName" , t.oldAddr1 as "oldAddr1" , t.newAddr1 as "newAddr1" , t.oldAddr2 as "oldAddr2" , t.newAddr2 as "newAddr2" , t.requestCommt as "requestCommt" from ( select a.requestDate , a.mdDupYN , a.venueGradCD , a.venueCD , a.venueNm , a.territoryCD , a.phoneNo , a.fascia , a.addrTpCD1 , a.addrTpCD2 , a.addrTpCD3 , a.addrTpCD4 , a.siteCD , a.segmentCD , a.subSegmentCD , a.channelCD , a.subChannelCD , a.reserveSegmentCD , a.ageingCD , a.kegYN , a.activeYN , a.locationCD , a.ws1CD , a.ws1SapCD , a.ws2CD , a.ws2SapCD , a.ws3CD , a.ws3SapCD , a.ws4CD , a.ws4SapCD , a.venueDivCD , a.incntTpCD , a.mdVenueCD , a.newAddr1 , a.oldAddr1 , a.postCD , a.requestStateCD , a.newAddr2 , a.oldAddr2 , a.commt as requestCommt from GVEN06MT a inner join GVEN02MT b on a.venueCD = b.venueCD where 1=1 and a.regID = #empID# and a.requestDate between #requestDateFrom# and #requestDateTo#
a.requestStateCD = #apprStateCD#
a.venueGradCD = #venueGradCD#
upper(a.venueCD) = upper(#venueCD#)
upper(a.venueNm) like '%'||upper(#venueNm#)||'%'
b.territoryCD = #territoryCD#
order by a.requestDate desc ) t where 1=1

select venueCD as "venueCD" , venueNm as "venueNm" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','VENUEGRADCD',venueGradCD,null) as "venueGradCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','SUBSEGMENTCD',subSegmentCD,null) as "subSegmentCDName" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD1',addrTpCD1,null) as "addrTpCD1Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD2',addrTpCD2,null) as "addrTpCD2Name" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ADDRTPCD3',addrTpCD3,null) as "addrTpCD3Name" , oldAddr2 as "oldAddr2" , getLangDesc(#companyID#,#languageCD#,'F_CODE','ACTIVEYN',activeYN,null) as "activeYNName" from( select venueCD as venueCD , venueNm as venueNm , venuegradcd as venuegradcd , activeYN as activeYN , addrTpCD1 as addrTpCD1 , addrTpCD2 as addrTpCD2 , addrTpCD3 as addrTpCD3 , addrTpCD4 as addrTpCD4 , segmentCD as segmentCD , subSegmentCD as subSegmentCD , oldAddr2 as oldAddr2 from gven02mt where activeyn = 'Y' and territoryCD = #territoryCD# union all
select venueCD as venueCD , venueNm as venueNm , venuegradcd as venuegradcd , activeYN as activeYN , addrTpCD1 as addrTpCD1 , addrTpCD2 as addrTpCD2 , addrTpCD3 as addrTpCD3 , addrTpCD4 as addrTpCD4 , segmentCD as segmentCD , subSegmentCD as subSegmentCD , oldAddr2 as oldAddr2 from gven02mt where venueCD in ( select c.venuecd from gleg01mt a, f_code b, gven02mt c, gemp01mt d where c.territorycd = b.comcode and c.activeyn = 'N' and d.dkmdtpcd = c.dkmdtpcd and a.empid = d.empid and ( (case when a.legalcd = '30' then '20' when a.legalcd = '40' then '30' else a.legalcd end) = b.attrib03 or nvl(b.attrib03,'') ='' ) and b.useyn = 'Y' and b.activeflg = 'U' and a.empid = #empID# and b.codediv = 'TERRITORYCD' )
)f where 1=1
upper(venueCD) = upper(#venueCD#)
activeYN = #activeYN#
upper(venueNm) like '%'||upper(#venueNm#)||'%'
select tmpVenueCD as "tmpVenueCD" from gven02mt where venuecd = #venueCD#

select count(*) as "totalCount" from GVEN06MT where 1=1
upper(b.venueCD) = upper(#venueCD#)
upper(venueNm) like '%'||upper(#venueNm#)||'%'
select dkmdtpcd as "dkmdTpCD" from gemp01mt where empid = #userID#
select count(*) as "cnt" from gven06mt where venuecd = #venueCD# and requestDate = #requestDate# and not requestStateCD in ('10', '40')
sqlMap.insert: merge into GVEN06MT t1 using dual on ( venueCD = #venueCD# and requestDate = #requestDate# ) when not matched then insert ( requestDate , apprDate , requestStateCD , lapprLevelNo , venueCD , venueNm , dkmdTpCD , territoryCD , venueGradCD , channelCD , subChannelCD , segmentCD , subSegmentCD , addrTpCD1 , addrTpCD2 , addrTpCD3 , ws1CD , ws1SapCD , note1 , note2 , note3 , note4 , incntTpCD , activeYN , regID , regDate , addrTpCD4 , venueDivCD , newAddr1 , oldAddr1 , fascia , mdDupYN , siteCD , ageingCD , kegYN , locationCD , reserveSegmentCD , reason1CD , reason2 , ws2CD , ws2SapCD , ws3CD , ws3SapCD , ws4CD , ws4SapCD , phoneNo , postCD , newAddr2 , oldAddr2 , legalCD , mdVenueCD , sellingAreaID , refNo , customerID , customerNm , country , rageSphereCD , teamCD , repNm , repNm_KR , sellingAreaNm , legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo , legacyBackOfficeAccountNo , license , createDate , sellingAreaCreatedDate , lastModifiedDate , sellingAreaLastModifiedDate , lastModifiedBy , commt ) values ( #requestDate# , sysdate , #requestStateCD# , #lapprLevelNo# , #venueCD# , #venueNm# , #dkmdTpCD# , #territoryCD# , #venueGradCD# , #channelCD# , #subChannelCD# , #segmentCD# , #subSegmentCD# , #addrTpCD1# , #addrTpCD2# , #addrTpCD3# , #ws1CD# , #ws1SapCD# , #note1# , #note2# , #note3# , #note4# , #incntTpCD# , #activeYN# , #userID# , sysdate , #addrTpCD4# , #venueDivCD# , #newAddr1# , #oldAddr1# , #fasciaCD# , #mdDupYN# , #siteCD# , #ageingCD# , #kegYN# , #locationCD# , #reserveSegmentCD# , #reason1CD# , #reason2# , #ws2CD# , #ws2SapCD# , #ws3CD# , #ws3SapCD# , #ws4CD# , #ws4SapCD# , #phoneNo# , #postCD# , #newAddr2# , #oldAddr2# , #legalCD# , #mdVenueCD# , #sellingAreaID# , #refNo# , #customerID# , #customerNm# , #country# , #rageSphereCD# , #teamCD# , #repNm# , #repNm_KR# , #sellingAreaNm# , #legacyFrontOfficeAccountNo# , #legacyBackOfficeAccountNo# , #license# , #createDate# , #sellingAreaCreatedDate# , #lastModifiedDate# , #sellingAreaLastModifiedDate# , #lastModifiedBy# , #commt# ) when matched then update set apprDate = sysdate , lapprLevelNo = #lapprLevelNo# , venueNm = #venueNm# , dkmdTpCD = #dkmdTpCD# , territoryCD = #territoryCD# , venueGradCD = #venueGradCD# , channelCD = #channelCD# , subChannelCD = #subChannelCD# , segmentCD = #segmentCD# , subSegmentCD = #subSegmentCD# , addrTpCD1 = #addrTpCD1# , addrTpCD2
